page.title: 04TEXTILE INDUSTRY
page.content: {Textiles}have always been important in {Hucknall}especially framework knitting.A few smaller firms still make garments.The major textile firms are {Highfields,Jaeger,Vedonis and Viyella who between them{employ about 850 {local people.}Vedonis make underwear, Viyella mens shirts, Highfields knitwear and Jaeger ladies sweaters. All firms have experienced difficulties with only Vedonis expanding. All firms blame low-cost foreign imports for non-expansion. App rox{240,000 garments}are produced per week with{ Vedonis}producing 3/4 of this. All companies export but most produce is for the home market.Viyella and Jaeger have{factory shops}in the town.
